rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample natural light and a small reception area. Designed in colonial style with decorative moldings.
Spacious living room integrated with the central courtyard, allowing natural ventilation and lighting. Colonial aesthetics are maintained.
rooms.vastu_alignment: South facing to promote social interactions

rooms.description: Colonial styled dining room adjacent to the living area with built-in seating and decorative details.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North facing for clarity and communication

rooms.description: Functional kitchen designed with colonial style cabinetry and ventilation opening towards the courtyard. Ensures compliance with local building norms.
Small utility bathroom in colonial style with essential fixtures. Located conveniently near the kitchen.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed in colonial style with wrought iron detailing.
Secondary exit door leading to the central courtyard and garden area.
Window in the living room offering views of the courtyard. Decorative colonial trims.

rooms.description: Large master bedroom with colonial architectural details, private balcony overlooking the courtyard.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North west for calmness and clarity

rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed in colonial style with built-in storage and a small seating area.
Cozy bedroom offering sufficient space with colonial detailing and ventilation through windows.
Another well-appointed bedroom in the duplex with colonial finishes and adequate natural light.
rooms.vastu_alignment: South east for warmth and vitality

rooms.description: ensuite bathroom for the master bedroom ensuring privacy and convenience, following colonial design cues.

openings.description: Door to the private balcony of the master bedroom providing views of the courtyard.

rooms.description: Open central courtyard designed with colonial landscaping elements that provide a communal garden space.
